title: Growezy
content:
Privacy Policy

Effective and last updated on: [22/11/2024]


This Privacy Policy outlines how the [ referred to as Professional / Organisation ] operating this growezy.club[ referred to as “website” ] collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use this website and avail any of the “services” [ for the sales and management of workshops, webinars, online classes, subscriptions, courses or group tours etc or communication / enquiry activities like filling a form, scheduling a call, booking an appointment etc or general administration / marketing related activies ]. By signing up with the Professional / Organisation through the Growezy.club platform, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

  1. Data Collection and Usage

    The “Professional / Organisation collects personal information such as name, email address, and other relevant details to provide and manage the services. This information is used solely for providing services and communication purposes.

    • All data transmitted between our servers and users is encrypted using industry-standard Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols.
    • Access to sensitive information is strictly limited to authorized personnel, specifically the technical head and founders of the organization. We enforce role-based access controls and regularly review permissions to ensure compliance with our data security standards.
    • We conduct comprehensive security audits on a monthly basis to identify and address potential vulnerabilities. These audits ensure that our systems remain secure and aligned with best practices for data protection.

  2. Third Party Interactions

    The Professional / Organisation may engage with third-party services for providing services, communications and other purposes.

    • User data is retained only for as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by law. Specific retention durations for different types of data are outlined in our internal policies and comply with applicable legal standards.
    • Users may request the deletion of their data at any time by contacting our support team. Upon receiving a deletion request, we securely erase all requested data from our systems

  3. Security and Protection

    The Professional / Organisation takes reasonable measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission or electronic storage is completely secure.

    • Consent and Agreement

      By signing up or accessing the services Professional / Organisation, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy.

      • Changes to Privacy Policy

        The Professional / Organisation may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on the Professional / Organisation website, and continued participation with services acceptance of the revised terms.

        • Contact Information

          For any inquiries or concerns related to this Privacy Policy, please contact the Professional / Organisation through the contact details provided on the Professional / Organisation website growezy.club
